admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the project is to help
            strengthen tax administration, in line with the ongoing tax
            reform, in order to miximize tax revenues in a sustainable
            way.  The project is designed to support the Tax and
            Financial Controls Office's (APEH's) modernization
            efforts to develop and streamline policies and procedures,
            and to implement the underlying information technology
            systems necessary for the functioning of a modern and
            efficient tax administration.  Specifically, the project
            will support:  (a) institutional development through the
            financing of short-term experts to provide advice in tax
            administration; (b) development and implementation of a new
            information technology system, including (i) technical
            assistance; (ii) computers and peripheral equipment; (iii)
            software development tools; and (iv) administrative software
            packages; and (c) training in development and the use of
            applications systems.  Training in use of hardware, and
            software tools will be provided by suppliers.
